name: Randomized Game (0.1)
description:
Greetings fellow traveller to the Randomized Game.

(This game is currently in development. More features will be add in the future and many major bugs will be patch.)

As said in the title, the content of the game will be randomly generated: from the colour pallets and item stats, to the names of items and the world generation algorithm.

I have been working on this game in my Devlogs, on my YouTube channel. subscribe to get the latest updates on my game development.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClIvXFBtZ7a3M5KPjyuuZ9w
